mapper.update: update member set amout = amout + #{amout} where id = #{memberid}
mapper.select: select m.id as id,m.username as username, m.telephone as telephone , m.sex as sex,mb.username as referrer,m.signtime as signtime, m.amout as amout,m.customType as customType from member m left JOIN member mb ON m.referrer = mb.id WHERE m.id = #{id}
SELECT amout from member where id = #{cardId}
SELECT * from member WHERE telephone = #{telephone} limit 1 offset 0
